original: Karlberg, Erik, disponent, Vimmer-by, f. 20/12/85 i Vimmerby av garve-rifabr. C. E. K. o. Ida Sundin. G. 2ö m. Anna Persson. Barn: Birgit f. 26. — Div. utl:res. t. utställn. m. m. 07-18. Anst. v. Lindekulla Garveri, ombiki. t. fam :boiag Vimmerb}^ Lä-derfabr. A-B 18, disp. där.
translated: Karlberg, Erik, manager, from Vimmerby, born on December 20, 1885, in Vimmerby, son of the tannery owner, C.E.K. and Ida Sundin. Married twice, first to Anna Persson. Children: Birgit, born in 1926. Had various trips abroad, including exhibitions, from 1907 to 1918. Employed at Lindekulla Tannery and later transferred to the family-owned Vimmerby Leather Factory, starting in 1918, where he became a manager.

structured.name: Erik Karlberg
structured.description: Manager from Vimmerby, son of C.E.K. and Ida Sundin
